column1: I've been reading through old forums and had some questions about my upcoming trip to Cabo in November.We are a couple in our late 20s staying at the Welk resort for a week - 1) Does it make sense to rent a car? 2) I personally want to catch a marlin and do some deep sea fishing - any tips? I hear Redrum is a good place to book through....do I need to make a rez in advance?3) Where's the best place to snorkel/dive?4) Any good challenging hikes?Thanks TA!

1) I think so, if you're planning all these excursions. I think a taxi is about $15US / 150-200 peso each way (between Welk & Cabo.)2) Definitely make reservations. November is excellent fishing.3) Several options. TA member caboticket is a DiveMaster with a great reputation. Send him a message. tripadvisor.com/members-forums/caboticket4) Mt Solmar! photos ... …google.com/PNWFamily/MtSolmarAndLandsEnd and an old thread with a few details: tripadvisor.com/ShowTopic-g152515-i84-k51685… (Don't reply to the old thread; just read it.)---------Car Rental Info ----------• Antonio Miranda. He is the manager at Cactus Car / Economy. Ask for an "insurance included TripAdvisor rate.” At the airport. Possible to arrange for delivery or pick up elsewhere; contact Antonio to ask.AMiranda@CactusCar.com ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦• Luis Morales. He is the manager of Alamo at the airport. Ask for a TripAdvisor rate that includes required insurance. Possible to drop in Cabo or SanJose; contact Luis to ask. AMorales@AlamoRentACar.com.mx ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦ ◦• Dominic Macalusso. He is a local businessman who specializes in customer service. Will pick up or deliver anywhere; insurance & full tank of gasoline included. Cash or credit; charges a higher price, but folks rave about the personal service. Help available any time (lock yourself out, lose the key, get a flat tire, get lost on the way to Todos Santos, total the van in a rainstorm/flood, whatever.) DomoSanLucas@prodigy.net.mx

endemic has now become an epidemic......
bwask... 15 and counting. Hard to keep up. Lol!!
